Eko Hotels and Suites bụ ụlọ nkwari akụ nwere kpakpando ise na Lagos
E guzobere ya na afọ 1977 dị ka Èkó Holiday Inn ma wuo ya na Victoria Island, ọ bụ nnukwu họtel na Naịjirịa. Ọ bụ onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ bụ Oluwole Olumuyiwa na mmekorita ya na ndị America
A gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Le Meridien Eko Hotel and Suites, Lagos
L'Hotel Eko Le Meridien bụ akụkụ nke Chagoury Group nke ụlọ ọrụ.

Ụlọ nkwari akụ ahụ nwere ọnụ ụlọ 825 na suites n'ime ụlọ anọ nwere ọtụtụ okpukpu, na-acha ọcha na-ele anya n'Oké Osimiri Atlantic na Kuramo Lagoon. Ụlọ nkwari akụ ahụ dị n'akụkụ ebe ego nke Lagos Island: Victoria Island.  Eko Hotels & Suites nwere ụlọ nkwari akụ nwanne nwanyị na Port Harcourt nke akpọrọ Hotel Presidential.

Eko Hotels & Suites nwere nnukwu ụlọ mgbakọ na Naịjirịa. Ihe omume ndị mere na ụlọ nkwari ahụ gụnyere; kọntaktị, ihe nkiri izizi, ihe ngosi mba ụwa, agbamakwụkwọ, nzukọ na emume onyinye. A na-ejikarị ebe mgbakọ ahụ eme ihe maka ihe omume ndị a ma nwee ike ijere mmadụ 6,000 ozi.
E nwere ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na ụlọ mmanya asatọ n'ime ụlọ nkwari akụ ahụ:
